mapper.select: select movie_code, movie_name, movie_open_date from tbl_movie

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select mbl.movie_buy_num, mc.movie_name, mbl.movie_price, mbl.movie_buy_date, mbl.user_id, mbl.movie_buy_check , tt.theater_name, a.area_name from tbl_movie_buy_list mbl, tbl_movie mc, tbl_movie_screen ms, tbl_theater tt, tbl_area a where mbl.movie_code = mc.movie_code and mbl.screen_code = ms.screen_code and ms.theater_code = tt.theater_code and tt.area_code = a.area_code
and a.area_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and tt.theater_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and mc.movie_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and mbl.user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and mbl.movie_buy_check = #{keyword}
order by movie_buy_date desc) a) where rnum between #{start_row} and #{end_row}

select count(*) from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select mbl.movie_buy_num, mc.movie_name, mbl.movie_price, mbl.movie_buy_date, mbl.user_id, mbl.movie_buy_check , tt.theater_name, a.area_name from tbl_movie_buy_list mbl, tbl_movie mc, tbl_movie_screen ms, tbl_theater tt, tbl_area a where mbl.movie_code = mc.movie_code and mbl.screen_code = ms.screen_code and ms.theater_code = tt.theater_code and tt.area_code = a.area_code
and a.area_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and tt.theater_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and mc.movie_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and mbl.user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and mbl.movie_buy_check = #{keyword}
order by movie_buy_date desc) a)
select theater_name, theater_code from tbl_theater where area_code = #{area_code}

select nvl(sum(mbl.movie_price), 0) from tbl_movie_buy_list mbl, tbl_movie_screen ms, tbl_theater tt, tbl_area a where
mbl.movie_code = #{movie_code} and tt.theater_code = #{theater_code} and a.area_code = #{area_code} and
a.area_code = #{area_code} and
a.area_code = #{area_code} and tt.theater_code = #{theater_code} and
mbl.screen_code = ms.screen_code and ms.theater_code = tt.theater_code and a.area_code = tt.area_code and movie_buy_date >= add_months(to_timestamp(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{mm_minus})
